thread.title: Shannon Wiseman Joins G2 Insurance Services as Assistant Vice President and Producer

author: cnbc.com
title: Shannon Wiseman Joins G2 Insurance Services as Assistant Vice President and Producer
text:
SAN FRANCISCO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Shannon Wiseman joined G2 Insurance Services as Assistant Vice President and Producer. Shannon joins G2’s growing sales team that plans to expand the company’s technology, shared economy and retail practices.
“We are so pleased to welcome Shannon to our team,” said Mark Ruggles, CEO. “Shannon’s business development experience with technology companies and her desire to understand client needs will offer decision makers the ability to implement the right solutions at the right time.”
Prior to joining G2 Insurance Services, Shannon was a top-performing Account Executive at Amazon. She was also responsible for business development at Cloudian, located in San Mateo. Shannon received her Bachelor of Arts degree from California State University, Chico.
“I always look forward to a new challenge,” said Shannon. “The opportunity to grow with a company that focuses on listening to clients and delivering on specific needs is unique. I’m a natural over-achiever so I can’t wait to go the extra mile for our clients.”
Shannon is located in G2 Insurance Services’ San Francisco office. She can be reached at 415-426-6661 and swiseman@G2insurance.com .
About G2 Insurance Services
Founded in 2012 and located in San Francisco, G2 Insurance Services is an independent, full-service property, casualty and employee benefits insurance brokerage firm focused on the risk management needs of for-profit companies, non-profit organizations and high-net-worth individuals. More information can be found at www.G2insurance.com .
